ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ English: They think coding is just a screen and some keys  But for me it is the language I use to scream in silence  It is the one place where my errors speak louder than my words  And my logic is my heart beating line by line They never see the pain of a missing semicolon  The way a small bug breaks a day worth of dreams  And still I sit back headphones on  Because I believe broken code is just a story half told I do not just write functions  I write freedom  I do not just fix errors  I fix the version of me that gave up yesterday Every line I write  Is a small rebellion against failure  And every time it runs  I know I am still alive
